**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at kumud@vipas.se
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How to Apply:**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested, we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Develop and maintain AI/ML solutions, including exploring large datasets, feature engineering, building data pipelines, testing and evaluating model outputs, and deploying solutions for production use in a scalable manner.
* Design and develop the large-scale data infrastructure needed for AI/ML projects.
* Contribute to architectural decisions and technical roadmaps while ensuring code quality, maintainability, and scalability.
* Develop reusable components and frameworks that address common needs in AI/ML, such as model traceability, monitoring, versioning, and online/batch inference serving.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams including engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders to build and enhance our AI ecosystem.


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* 5+ years of professional experience in relevant roles for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, with a strong focus on AI/ML development.
* Strong software engineering background with hands-on experience in coding, DevOps, testing, and Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) principles, applied to AI/ML projects.
* Proven experience developing and deploying software solutions to production in large-scale environments, ensuring product quality, cybersecurity, and performance.
* Proficiency in modern programming languages, particularly Python (4+ years), with experience in back-end development and familiarity with FastAPI.
* Expertise in cloud technologies, especially Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Vertex AI, for cloud-based ML development.
* Solid experience with MLOps practices, including developing ML pipelines and deploying applications to production.
* A strong data science background with proficiency in various AI/ML techniques and frameworks.
* Experience with high-volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream), with expertise in SQL, DBT, and cloud data storage technologies.
* Experience with requirement analysis, solution design, breaking down work into tasks, and collaborating with stakeholders to ensure implementation of organizational standards and best practices.
* Familiarity with agile working methodologies and a strong focus on data-driven development.
* GCP machine learning certification


**Application deadline:** 
 21-05-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Engineer
description:
Your Team Responsibilities
   

  

 Team delivers functionality to a varsity of tools used by the real estate market around the world.
   

  

 Your Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features and enhancements that meet business requirements and align with the technical architecture
* Develop and support scalable, applications and systems and serve features for the property- and index market on our web and API products
* Closely collaborate with partners across product and design, engineering, and business teams to drive innovations that improve our customers’ experience
* Follow software-development best practices including test-driven development, contributing to documentation, feature flagging, etc
* Help to maintain and improve existing pipelines
* Collaborate with DevOps to plan resources and continuously optimize the infrastructure and configuration of our data pipelines to ensure a healthy and high-performance production deployments
* Performing any other tasks as assigned by line manager
* Performing any other tasks as assigned by line manager


**Your Skills And Experience That Will Help You Excel**
* Bachelors degree in Computer Science, or a related field
* 5+ years of relevant back-end programming experience using languages such as .Net, Python or Node.js
* Solid comprehension of common design patterns, algorithms, and data structures
* Solid understanding of distributed systems
* Working knowledge of containerization
* Excellent communication and presentation skills

**About MSCI**

* Multi-directional career paths that offer professional growth and development through new challenges, internal mobility and expanded roles.
* We actively nurture an environment that builds a sense of inclusion belonging and connection, including eight Employee Resource Groups. All Abilities, Asian Support Network, Black Leadership Network, Climate Action Network, Hola! MSCI, Pride & Allies, Women in Tech, and Women’s Leadership Forum.


 At MSCI we are passionate about what we do, and we are inspired by our purpose – to power better investment decisions. You’ll be part of an industry-leading network of creative, curious, and entrepreneurial pioneers. This is a space where you can challenge yourself, set new standards and perform beyond expectations for yourself, our clients, and our industry.
   

  

 MSCI is a leading provider of critical decision support tools and services for the global investment community. With over 50 years of expertise in research, data, and technology, we power better investment decisions by enabling clients to understand and analyze key drivers of risk and return and confidently build more effective portfolios. We create industry-leading research-enhanced solutions that clients use to gain insight into and improve transparency across the investment process.
   

  

 MSCI Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. It is the policy of the firm to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, religion, creed, age, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, citizenship, disability, marital and civil partnership/union status, pregnancy (including unlawful discrimination on the basis of a legally protected parental leave), veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. MSCI is also committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you are an individual with a disability and would like to request a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application process, please email Disability.Assistance@msci.com and indicate the specifics of the assistance needed. Please note, this e-mail is intended only for individuals who are requesting a reasonable workplace accommodation; it is not intended for other inquiries.
   

  

**To all recruitment agencies**
 MSCI does not accept unsolicited CVs/Resumes. Please do not forward CVs/Resumes to any MSCI employee, location, or website. MSCI is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited CVs/Resumes.
   

  

**Note on recruitment scams**
 We are aware of recruitment scams where fraudsters impersonating MSCI personnel may try and elicit personal information from job seekers. Read our full note on careers.msci.com

title: Cloud & Infrastructure Architect (Swedish)
company_industry: Industrial Machinery Manufacturing and Individual and Family Services
description:
**About Tata Consultancy Services Ltd (TCS)** 




  





*Tata Consultancy Services is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses in their transformation journeys for over 50 years. TCS offers a consulting-led, cognitive powered, integrated portfolio of business, technology and engineering services and solutions. This is delivered through its unique Location Independent AgileTM delivery model, recognized as a benchmark of excellence in software development.* 




  





*A part of the Tata group, India's largest multinational business group, TCS has over 443,000 of the world’s best-trained consultants in 46 countries. The company generated consolidated revenues of US $22 billion in the fiscal year ended March 31, 2020, and is listed on the BSE (formerly Bombay Stock Exchange) and the NSE (National Stock Exchange) in India. TCS' proactive stance on climate change and award-winning work with communities across the world have earned it a place in leading sustainability indices such as the Dow Jones Sustainability Index (DJSI), MSCI Global Sustainability Index and the FTSE4Good Emerging Index.* 




  





*For more information, visit us at www.tcs.com.* 




  





**TCS in the Nordics** 




*TCS was established in the Nordics in 1991 and there are more than 15,000 professionals working for customers in Sweden, Finland, Norway and Denmark. The last 11 years TCS in the Nordics has been ranked by its customers as the best IT Consultancy Company and TCS has also been awarded number 1 Top Employer in Europe the last two years.* 




  





**Job Title: Cloud & Infrastructure Architect (Swedish)** 




**Location: Stockholm, Sweden** 




**Language requirement: English & Swedish** 




  





 We are looking for a new colleague to take part in and lead Public Cloud (AZURE) based Architecture initiatives within the Cloud, Cloud Native & Infrastructure area together with our clients. At Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), you will experience many different projects, customers, and cultures – a truly exciting journey!
 



  





 If you have broad experience and a strong interest in the IT industry, markets, trends, technologies, infrastructure, and their implications – then you should join us!
 



  





**About the Role:** 




  





 As our Cloud (Azure) & Infrastructure Architect, you will be accountable for leading key infrastructure transformation engagements in line with recognized industry best practices and methodologies. You will take full responsibility for the solution including architecture, design and implementation, in collaboration with the wider TCS teams. Furthermore, your responsibilities will include:
 



  




1. Design and technical leadership for Cloud, Cloud Native & Infrastructure, including servers, storage, and networks that support the applications and business processes of customers.
2. Create best-in-class Cloud Adoption, Cloud Native, DevOps Solutions and infrastructure solutions for customers based on business drivers and technology needs
3. Design and implement cloud strategies and roadmaps in alignment with business objectives.
4. Lead architecture and design sessions with key stakeholders
5. Lead solution development during sales cycle
6. Optimize cloud costs and resources while maintaining high performance and availability
7. Ensure solutions comply with regulatory standards and internal policies
8. Oversee the implementation and deployment of Azure solutions
9. As a key member, actively contribute to TCS’ account planning and customer satisfaction goals



  





**Experience** 




  





 We are looking for a senior architect with experience in IT service delivery, project/program management or transformation engagements. You have formal project management qualifications as well as proven abilities in:
 



  




1. Demonstrated technical leadership in Cloud Transformation, Cloud Native Solutions and Cloud engineering including AKS, DevOps transformation program, with the ability to clearly formulate end-to-end architecture, design and implementation in accordance with customer's requirements
2. Hands on experience in architecting scalable, resilient, and cost-efficient cloud architectures aligned with business objectives and technical requirements
3. Experience in enterprise architecture principles and ability to write detailed architectural design documents
4. Experience in enterprise hybrid cloud architecture including both public and private cloud
5. Cost optimization strategies
6. Knowledge of DevOps tools and methodologies
7. Demonstrated customer service, communications and leadership skills
8. Good understanding of Infrastructure outsourcing and transformation process. Experience in ITIL roles, process, and report management
9. Understanding of SAFe principles and ways of working
10. Basic knowledge of Project Management methodologies
11. Architect certification such as TOGAF is preferred
12. Public cloud architectural certifications are preferred



  





 Familiarity with containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration platforms such as Kubernetes (AKS) and Azure DevOps, you have a broad experience of the IT industry, markets, trends, technologies and their implications as well as extensive knowledge of outsourcing structure and processes. To succeed in the role, you should have successfully managed and completed at least a couple of complex infrastructure transformation programs. Also, experience of IT projects with teams spread globally will be an advantage in this role. You have excellent interpersonal skills demonstrated through relationship management and networking.
 



  





**Person profile** 




  





 You have a global/multi-cultural approach and mind-set. Also, you have strong communication, team leadership, and relationship building skills. Of course, you have a strong interest in technology and digitization, and strong technical skills. You are ambitious and a self-starter, with a strong intellectual curiosity (thought leadership).
 



  





**APPLICATION** 




 Please apply with your resume (in English), directly here in LinkedIn. Any questions regarding the position can be sent to
 **r.naveen2@tcs.com** 
 , marked “Cloud & Infrastructure Architect”

title: D365 Finance & Operations (F&O) Release Manager
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, IT System Data Services, and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented D365 F&O Release Manager to lead and coordinate all release management activities within our Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations environment. This role is responsible for managing end-to-end release cycles, including planning, deployment, risk management, and post-release activities. The ideal candidate will bring strong governance skills, technical understanding of D365 F&O, and a collaborative mindset to ensure smooth and secure rollouts of updates and customizations.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 • Define and manage the D365 F&O release calendar, aligning with business and technical stakeholders.
 



 • Oversee deployment of code and configurations across environments (Development, Test, UAT, Production).
 



 • Govern the release lifecycle by coordinating build, test, and deployment activities using LCS and Azure DevOps.
 



 • Ensure all releases follow structured testing, including unit, integration, regression, and performance testing.
 



 • Lead go/no-go assessments, risk reviews, and ensure rollback and contingency plans are in place.
 



 • Serve as the single point of contact for release-related communication to all stakeholders.
 



 • Coordinate cutover activities during releases and ensure minimal downtime during deployments.
 



 • Maintain documentation including release notes, test evidence, and audit compliance reports.
 



 • Continuously improve release processes by adopting CI/CD pipelines and automation practices.
 



  





 Qualifications:
 



 • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.
 



 • 8+ years of experience in ERP release management, preferably within D365 F&O or AX.
 



 • Strong understanding of Microsoft LCS, Azure DevOps, and D365 environment topology.
 



 • Experience with managing releases in a regulated or audit-sensitive environment.
 



 • Familiarity with ITIL, DevOps, and Agile methodologies.
 



 • Excellent organizational, communication, and stakeholder management skills.
 



 • Ability to manage multiple parallel releases and prioritize effectively.
 



  





 Nice to Have:
 



 • Microsoft certifications in D365 F&O or Azure.
 



 • Experience in managing third-party integrations or ISV solutions in D365.
 



 • Knowledge of automation tools or scripting in Azure pipelines.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Är du sugen på en ny utmaning och vill vara med på resan mot världens bästa spelupplevelse? Nu är vi på jakt efter en ny kollega till Martech som vill vara med och bidra till att skapa ett kundmöte i världsklass!
   

  

 Martech, eller Marketing Technologies, är ett samlingsnamn för teknik som stödjer marknadsföringsprocesser och är en nyckel för att kunna skapa en unik, personlig, digital kundupplevelse. Vår vision är en datadriven kundrelation som löpande skapar värde både för Svenska Spel och våra kunder.
   

  

**Vad kommer du att göra?**
 Svenska Spel och Martech är på en spännande förändringsresa. Vi moderniserar vår dataarkitektur med satsningar på Data Mesh, strömmande data i Kafka och ett skifte mot Google Cloud Platform (GCP) som vår centrala dataplattform. I detta arbete kommer den här rollen vara en viktig teamseplare för att bidra till Martechs förflyttningar.
   

  

 Som Data Engineer hos oss kommer du att arbeta med hela kedjan av våra dataflöden. Du hanterar strömmande data i Kafka och gör information tillgänglig för olika användningsområden. Du utvecklar och bearbetar data i GCP och är med och förbereder Martech för ett fullt fungerande molnbaserat ekosystem.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter spänner över flera områden – från utveckling, analys och systemdesign till CI/CD, testning och implementation. Du kommer även att vara delaktig i att hantera driftsfrågor och eventuella produktionsstörningar. Din roll blir central i utvecklingen av vårt nya, moderna datalandskap.
   

  

 Hos Martech blir du en del av ett engagerat och kompetent team med stark laganda och en inkluderande kultur. Vi jobbar agilt och i nära samarbete med våra kollegor inom Försäljning och Marknad.
   

  

**Är du den som kommer att göra det?**
 Som person är du framåtlutad, kvalitetsmedveten och noggrann. Du trivs med att arbeta i team och att dela med dig av dina erfarenheter och kunskaper. Vi ser att du har en relevant utbildning samt några års arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta som Data Engineer.
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som Har Erfarenhet Av**
* Realtidsbearbetning av strömmande data med Kafka-relaterade verktyg
* C#, Scala eller Java
* Molntjänster som GCP eller AWS
* DevOps


**Extra Meriterande Om Du Har Erfarenhet Av**
* Utveckling i Python eller JavaScript
* Produktifiering av data enligt Data Mesh eller liknande Data Management-strategi
* BigQuery
* SQL
* Terraform


**Om Tech på Svenska Spel**
 På Svenska Spel hanterar vi 10 000 000 transaktioner varje dag, året runt och på sex dagar har vi hanterat samma transaktionsvolym som den största pengaöverföringsappen gör på en månad. Varje dag utvecklar, driftar och supportar vi ett av världens mest avancerade spelsystem, vi är med andra ord ett techbolag som sysslar med spel - inte tvärtom. Det här kommer med ett ansvar, både för folkets drömmar och spänning, men även för deras spelande. Vi flyttar ständigt fram gränserna för vår tech och låter aldrig vår Drömmaskin stå still. Kom och utveckla den med oss!
   

  

**Vi är Svenska Spel**
 Svenska Spel är hela Sveriges spelbolag. Vi skapar hållbara och roliga spelupplevelser som bidrar till ett bättre Sverige. Genom spel som Triss, Stryktipset och Oddset ger vi våra fyra miljoner kunder spänning, glädje och drömmar. Våra spel är enkla och trygga och oavsett om man spelar online eller fysiskt, själv eller tillsammans med andra, så ska upplevelsen alltid vara positiv. Vi vill att fler ska spela hållbart hos oss och vår verksamhet ska bedrivas på ett socialt, ekonomiskt och miljömässigt ansvarsfullt sätt. Varje år går överskottet till statskassan. Vi är Sveriges största idrottssponsor och investerar nära 300 miljoner kronor årligen i svensk idrott. Vi är modiga, nyfikna och strävar efter enkelhet i allt vi gör samt skapar resultat tillsammans.
   

  

*Är du nyfiken på våra förmåner? Då hittar du dem här!*
**Ansökan och kontaktuppgifter**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med placering i Visby eller Stockholm med möjlighet till flexibelt distansarbete.
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Sofie Anlert, Chef Martech, Sofie.Anlert@svenskaspel.se
   

  

 För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta Team Talent Acquisition, teamta@svenskaspel.se
   

  

 Vi utför intervjuer och urval löpande så tveka inte med att skicka in din ansökan redan idag.

title: Data Engineer, Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Do you want to be part of our in-house Machine Learning team and take part in PostNord’s digital transformation journey? Do you wish to work hands-on across the whole data engineering area? Then you should apply for this position as a Data Engineer!
   

  

 Join us
   

  

 The Machine Learning team’s main responsibility is to create production volume forecasts for PostNord production units. It is our goal to create machine learning models that deliver forecasts with high accuracy, that enables PostNord’s production units to plan staffing levels and truck utilization in the most efficient and environmentally friendly way.
   

  

 PostNord is the leader of logistics and postal services in the Nordics. As a part of the IT organization, we support a variety of different PostNord stakeholders in a multitude of areas, such as e.g. HR, mail and logistics. We are already delivering business critical forecasting models that are an important piece of the puzzle of optimizing our operations,
   

  

 Our digital transformation journey started a few years back with migrating BI/DW platforms to Azure and we are now using a modern infrastructure to build solutions that enables data-driven decision making.
   

  

 The team delivery consists of developing, training, running and monitoring time series-based volume forecasting, based on our vast amounts of historical data on logistics operations in the Nordics.
   

  

 Our technology is focused on the Azure stack, and includes Azure Auto ML, Azure ML Ops, Azure DevOps CI/CD, Power BI etc.
   

  

 This is a "hands-on" position requiring solid technical skills that allows working across the whole data engineering discipline. You will build and optimize complex data pipelines in Microsoft Azure and Databricks. You will work closely with other data analysts, forecasting specialists and data scientists to provide the required data models and data sets and enable the training of new machine learning models. You will take part in building the cloud infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources to Azure. As a data engineer you will also be able to create visual data presentations in the form of dashboards and reports.
   

  

 ,
   

  

* A bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, mathematics, statistics, or a related field.
* At least 3-5 years of experience in data engineering
* Experience in developing and deploying data pipelines in cloud-based environments (Azure preferred).
* Experience in building and optimizing data pipelines and data lakes/warehouses – in a cloud environment preferably Azure.
* Experience with ETL and data modelling.
* Experience in Azure ADF and Databricks.
* Strong understanding of core cloud concepts - Azure data storage, Azure compute, data connections and APIs.
* Proficiency in Python.
* Knowledge and exposure to structured and unstructured data, file formats, storage, etc.
* Experience in data modelling and with data visualization in Power BI or similar tool.
* Familiarity with modern data architecture, (MS SQL preferred).
* Communication skills in both written and spoken English.


 Meritorious experience
   

  

* Communication skills in both written and spoken Swedish.
* Experience in AGILE project methodology and practice.
* Prior experience implementing generative AI/LLM’s or ML.
* Experience in using containerization and orchestration tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, or Helm for building and deploying scalable and reproducible machine learning applications.
* Have worked with Azure ML Studio and Azure DevOps


 We accept applications from all of EU but would require a remote colleague to be willing to visit on site on a regular basis.
   

  

 We offer you
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and health center (Solna).
* Employee benefits through PostNord’s own personnel foundation PostNord Plus.
* Great occupational pension terms.
* Great development opportunities and a continuous learning culture.
* Employment in Solna/Hybrid.


**About Us**
 We make everyday life easier! PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal- and logistic services to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region.
   

  

 Apply
   

  

 We look forward receiving your application! If you have any questions or concerns, you are welcome to contact Pernille Skovborg at pernille.skovborg@postnord.com.
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga

title: Tech Lead – Ramudden Global
description:
**About Ramudden Global**
 Ramudden Global is the global leader of temporary traffic management (TTM) solutions for critical infrastructure, combining rental of TTM safety equipment, digital solutions, and services.
   

  

 With over 5,000 employees across 13 countries and sales of €1 billion a year, our success is down to our focus on our mission,
 **‘to get people home safely every day** 
 ’. No matter where you are, our employees, our customers’ employees and the general public deserve to work, travel and move through the world safely. We believe this is what matters most.
   

  

 It inspires our entrepreneurial spirit and creativity, sharing ideas and solutions to lead the way in innovation and governance to become a force for good. A caring force for a safer world.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Tech Lead to join our Global Platform Team. You will be part of a team working on a modern, cloud-based platform that manages digital devices globally. This platform powers global digital device management by integrating diverse device types, managing their state changes, and connecting seamlessly with third-party services. As the Tech Lead, you will own the team’s technical vision, create innovative solutions, and take full ownership of delivering scalable, reliable software.
   

  

**Tech Stack**
* Backend: .NET 9.0, C#
* Frontend: React, Typescript
* Databases: PostgreSQL with PostGIS
* Data & Analytics: Stitch, DBT, Snowflake, PowerBI
* Cloud: Azure (Service Bus, Container Apps)
* Architectural Patterns: Clean Architecture, CQRS, Domain-Driven Design, Repository Pattern, Event Driven Architecture (EDA)
* DevOps: Docker, GitHub Actions, Infrastructure as Code (Bicep)


**What You'll Do**
 As the Technical Lead, you will:
   

  

* Shape and drive the team’s technical strategy, ensuring alignment with the company’s vision.
* Implement and promote best practices in software architecture, clean coding, and design across the team.
* Mentor, guide, and empower team members to deliver robust, scalable solutions.
* Collaborate with the Product Manager to plan and estimate features, aligning engineering and business priorities.
* Participate in product development from start to finish, driving ideation, new development, iteration, and maintenance.
* Advocate for and implement solutions leveraging modern patterns such as Clean Architecture, Domain-Driven Design, and Event-Driven Architecture.


**What We're Looking For**
 We’re on the lookout for a hands-on leader with a strong technical background who embodies a growth mindset. You’ll thrive in this position if you have:
   

  

* Passion for working in teams and co-create solutions together with your colleagues and stakeholders.
* 5+ years experience with object-oriented languages (C#, Java, Kotlin) and back-end development.
* Expertise in software and solution architecture, with a record of crafting robust, scalable systems.
* Proficiency with front-end technologies like TypeScript and React.
* A deep understanding of Clean Architecture and Domain-Driven Design principles.
* Strong SQL and database design skills (experience with PostgreSQL/PostGIS is a big plus).
* Understanding of the Transport (T4)-Layer
* Strong automated testing skills to ensure stability and reliability.


**It's a plus if you:**
* Have experience in IoT or device management systems
* Have background knowledge or interest in modern architectural principles
* Have collaborated with data engineering teams or worked on data pipelines


**Hiring process and application**
 At Ramudden, our mission is to get people home safely every day. That’s why we firmly believe that alcohol and drugs have no place in our workplaces or on the road. As part of our recruitment process, we therefore conduct alcohol and drug testing.
   

  

 We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences. We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Senior Data Platform Engineer – Data Query & Export
description:
Why This Role Matters
   

  

 Funnel’s platform powers thousands of businesses around the world, providing them with marketing data they can trust and act on. A growing number of our more technical customers are treating Funnel like a data warehouse or data infrastructure provider — expecting direct, reliable, and high-performance access to their raw and modeled data.
   

  

 To meet this demand, we’re hiring a Senior Data Platform Engineer – Data Query and Export to focus on how we deliver and expose customer data at scale. You’ll work on evolving our platform into something that can support low-latency, multi-tenant data querying and efficient export, enabling customers to seamlessly access large datasets from their data lakes, warehouses, or analytics tools.
   

  

 You’ll be part of the Data platform team, building infrastructure that serves external customers and operates as a core part of our SaaS product.
   

  

**About The Engineering Teams & Role**
 At Funnel, engineers have end-to-end ownership of their systems — from design and implementation to deployment, observability, and scaling. Our platform teams are responsible for the foundations that make the product fast, reliable, and scalable for 2,000+ businesses (and growing).
   

  

**Role**
 In this role, you'll focus on the part of the data platform that powers customer-facing data access and delivery. That means architecting systems that:
   

  

* Handle large-scale data volumes efficiently
* Serve a multi-tenant environment with high performance and reliability
* Are extensible and adaptable for future use cases (e.g., data lakes, lakehouse integrations, advanced querying)


 You’ll collaborate closely with colleagues working on infrastructure, connectors, modeling, and customer experience — but your domain will be the systems that make customer data accessible at scale.
   

  

 What You’ll Do
   

  

* Design and build systems that expose and export data to external users, treating data delivery as a first-class part of our platform.
* Work with technologies like Apache Arrow, Parquet, Iceberg, and DataFusion to support queryable, structured access to large datasets.
* Ensure that our data query and export infrastructure is scalable, reliable, and multi-tenant aware.
* Define and evolve technology and storage patterns for customers to interact with their data efficiently and safely.
* Set up and manage cloud-native infrastructure (primarily in AWS) to support storage, access control, and high-throughput data access patterns.
* Contribute to system architecture and collaborate with other teams to ensure alignment across the platform.
* Continuously improve observability, performance, and operational robustness.


**Skills & Experience We’re Looking For**
* 6–10+ years of backend or platform engineering experience in data-intensive environments.
* Experience designing multi-tenant systems and understanding the architectural challenges they present (e.g., isolation, performance, cost control).
* Proficiency with cloud infrastructure, especially in AWS (S3, IAM, CDK, ECS, etc.).
* Experience with developing distributed systems for processing data.
* Solid programming skills in a backend language such as C/C++, Go, Java, or Rust (We use Rust in our data processing, it is not required, but nice to have).
* Comfortable designing and evolving systems with a customer-centric mindset.
* Knowledge of security, access control, and data governance in customer-facing data platforms.


 What Makes You a Great Match for Funnel
   

  

* You’re energized by infrastructure that powers products, not just supports internal teams.
* You enjoy solving scaling and performance challenges in real-world, customer-facing systems.
* You’re pragmatic — you find simple solutions to complex problems and iterate as needed.
* You value strong collaboration, clear communication, and a “build together” mindset.
* You care deeply about creating reliable, accessible systems that external users can depend on.


 Learn more about our platform in this blog post by our CTO, Jonas Björk: Building Funnel’s Data Platform for MarketingAnalytics.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 At this time, we can only consider applicants who are already located in
 **Stockholm** 
 and:
   

  

* Hold Swedish citizenship, or
* Hold EU/EEA citizenship and are currently living in Stockholm, or
* Have a valid Swedish work permit


**Benefits & Perks**
 We offer a competitive salary along with great benefits. → Take a look at our benefits here.
   

  

**Interview Process**
 We have a 4-step recruitment process for most roles → Get an overview of the steps here.
   

  

**Inclusiveness**
 Research shows that many candidates, especially women and individuals from underrepresented groups, may hesitate to apply for a role unless they meet every requirement. If this role excites you and your skills and experiences align, we strongly encourage you to apply. We’re interested in what you can bring, even if you don’t check every box.
   

  

**Office-first**
 At Funnel, we have an office-first approach, and we work from the office a minimum of four days a week. We have lots of flexibility for when life happens, during the summer, through the holidays however, we avoid having standing remote days.
   

  

**About Funnel**
 Funnel is the leading Marketing Intelligence platform that empowers marketers to automatically collect, model, visualize, and analyze data from over 500 marketing platforms—without the need for SQL or scripting.
   

  

 Now equipped with measurement, Funnel combines Marketing Mix Modelling, Multi-Touch Attribution, and Incrementality Testing to triangulate the true effectiveness of marketing efforts and provide smart, data-driven suggestions.
   

  

 Funnel enables a workflow that automates the collection of all the data the customer needs, easy creation and maintenance of a robust data model with the customer's own concepts and metrics, with an AI-powered model for marketing measurement, and beautiful reporting on top.
   

  

 All this without the user having to write a single line of code or even be particularly technical. Our vision is that the people who need data for their decision-making should have the tools to do it themselves - and not be dependent on their technical colleagues.
   

  

 Trusted by more than 2,000 businesses worldwide, including globally recognized brands such as Adidas and Sony, Funnel generated over $50M in ARR in 2023 and continues to feature in the FT 1000 list of Europe’s fastest-growing companies.
   

  

 Since its founding in 2014, Funnel has grown into a global team of over 300 employees, with offices in Stockholm, Boston, Dublin, London, Hamburg, and Sydney.
   

  

 Funnel is a SaaS product designed to help marketing teams own their performance. Founded in 2014 in Stockholm, and still founder-led, the Funnel team has grown with our customers – serving more than 2,000 companies from our Stockholm, Boston, Dublin, Hamburg and Sydney offices. We value increased in-person collaboration, and as such, we work a minimum of four days a week from our offices.
   

  

 We have always put the customer first, expressed in a no-commission sales model and a customer-centric development approach. We are proud to help companies such as Havas Media, Adidas, Sony, and Home Depot to unlock the true impact of their data.

title: Dynamics 365 Specialist - CE/F&SCM
description:
*Engage Group befinner sig på en snabb tillväxtresa med många nya projekt som startar och vi söker nu fler Dynamics 365* 
 F&SCM
 *specialister som vill utvecklas i sin karriär och arbeta med spännande uppdrag.* 




  





 Vad erbjuder vi dig?
 



 Hos oss jobbar du som en del av ett team med seniora experter och jobbar 100% fokuserat i ett projekt, tillsammans. Vi jobbar med stora kunder som har huvudsäte i Sverige, men som är aktiva på den globala marknaden. Våra främsta områden är Manufacturing, Retail, och Professional Services och vi fokuserar på globala utrullningar, där vi jobbar med hela D365 plattformen och end to end processer (full omnichannel, från e-handel till kassor osv). Vi har också färdiga projekt att ansluta till, vilket ger dig en smidig start när du börjar hos oss.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder även möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din karriär. Engage Group är ett kunskapshus där vi regelbundet genomför kompetensutveckling, webinars och mentorskapsprogram, och du har möjlighet att bli lösningsarkitekt eller domän expert. För att stödja dig i din utveckling, har du alltid stöttning av erfarna kollegor och en stöttande chef genom hela processen, allt för att du skall trivas och känna dig trygg med din arbetsinsats.
 



  





*Vårt team* 




 Vi har ett starkt anseende för att leverera hög kvalitet och vårt team består av de allra bästa i branschen. Du kommer alltid att arbeta i nära samarbete tillsammans med seniora konsulter, som är experter inom sitt område. Hos oss jobbar du också tillsammans med
 
 Sveriges enda
 
 FastTrack Recognized lösnings arkitekter och MVPer inom Dynamics Finance and Supplychain, vilket ger dig ett stort utrymme att utvecklas ihop med dina kollegor.
 



  





 Vi är stolta över att att kalla oss familjära experter, då vi stöttar varandra och möter kunders utmaningar tillsammans, något som genomsyrar hela vår kultur. Vi främjar tätt samarbete och vi arrangerar regelbundet sociala aktiviteter som AW:s och deltagande på sportaktiviteter. För att fira våra gemensamma framgångar, så har vi årligen en större konferens (oftast utanför Sverige), för att stärka banden internt också utanför ordinarie arbetstid. Tillsammans med vår informella och entreprenöriella företagskultur och korta beslutsvägar gör detta Engage till en perfekt match för dig som vill ta nästa steg.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsplats där work-life balance är i fokus och du har alltid nära till ett av våra kontor runtom i Sverige (Jönköping, Kalmar, Malmö, Göteborg, Stockholm).
 



  





 Hör från blivande kollegor om varför de valde just Engage Group:
 



*"Jag valde Engage för deras omfattande erfarenhet och kompetens inom Dynamics-plattformen. Att arbeta med några av de bästa inom området kommer att ge mig möjlighet att fortsätta lära mig samtidigt som jag bidrar till spännande projekt världen över, både nu och i framtiden."* 




  





*"Jag valde att börja på Engage Group eftersom jag vill arbeta med några av de bästa inom mitt område. Jag blev imponerad av de andra specialisterna och kompetensen inom företaget och vill gärna vara en del av det, samt vara en del av ett nytt och modernt företag som snabbt expanderar. Jag ser fram emot framtiden på Engage och hoppas kunna lära mig och dela mycket kunskap här."* 




  





*"Jag valde Engage för att arbeta med spännande projekt världen över tillsammans med några av de bästa experterna inom Dynamics 365. Med en informell och entreprenöriell företagskultur, korta beslutsvägar och en samarbetsinriktad kultur är Engage en perfekt match för mig."* 




  





 Vill du bli en del av vårt team? Vi söker dig som:
 



  




* Flerårig erfarenhet av ERP
* Erfarenhet av end-to-end Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&SCM
* Förbereda och driva workshops och kravinsamling.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska.



  





 Meriterande kvalifikationer:
 


* Erfarenhet inom retail och/eller manufacturing.
* Kunskap om agila principer och Azure DevOps.
* Kompetens inom Power Platform och/eller Azure.



  





 Om Engage
 



*Engage är ett expertkonsultföretag inom Microsoft Dynamics. Våra medarbetare är branschledande specialister inom Dynamics-ekosystemet och fokuserar på toppmoderna lösningar för Dynamics-miljön. Våra kunder är baserade i Sverige men har en global närvaro och vår verksamhet är internationell.* 




  





*Vi har 100+ anställda på kontor i Jönköping, Göteborg, Malmö, Kalmar och Stockholm. Engage har en långsiktig tillväxtplan och du kommer att bli en del av ett företag som växer snabbt på en mycket intressant marknad.* 




  





 Intresseanmälan:
 



 Vi ser fram emot att arbeta med dig. Känner du likadant för oss? Om du vill veta mer, kontakta oss på contact@engagenow.com eller läs mer på vår hemsida: https://engagenow.com/career-2/

title: Senior BIM/Revit Modeler
description:
**Description**


**The opportunity**


We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced **Senior BIM/Revit Modeler** to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for creating, managing, and coordinating detailed 3D models for civil and architectural projects. This position requires advanced proficiency in Revit and a deep understanding of both civil engineering and architectural design principles. You will collaborate closely with engineers and project managers to ensure that all models meet technical specifications and project requirements.


You will join a global and dynamic team of 18 people, based in Sweden, Finland, and India. This position will be based in Sweden, either in Ludvika or Västerås.

**How you will make an impact**

* Develop and prepare detailed 3D models using BIM software such as Revit
* Generate and extract 2D drawings and details from 3D models for construction documentation
* Produce 3D models, extract material quantities, and generate detailed Bills of Materials for project estimation
* Collaborate with engineers and other professionals to gather necessary information for accurate model creation
* Create and update models in Construction Cloud
* Mentor and train junior staff in Revit/CAD-related concepts and best practices

**Your background**

* MSc or BSc in Civil or Architectural Engineering
* Several years of experience in BIM modeling and structural design
* Proficiency in BIM software such as Revit, AutoCAD, and Navisworks
* Knowledge of Tekla Structures and STAAD Pro is considered a great advantage
* Excellent communication skills, both written and spoken, with the ability to work effectively with team members and clients across different cultures and time zones
* Strong problem-solving skills and a keen eye for detail

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

**More about us**

  

Are you ready for an exciting new challenge? Welcome to apply for this position!


Recruiting Manager, Elyas Hashemi, elyas.hashemi@hitachienergy.com will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives - Sveriges Ingenjörer; Mikael Hjort, + 46 107 38 29 86; Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 107-38 70 43; Unionen: Fredrik Holmgren, +46 107 38 21 85. All other questions can be directed to Talent Acquisition Partner Ingrid Schjelderup, ingrid.schjelderup@hitachienergy.com.

**Qualified individuals with a disability may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Hitachi Energy career site as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by completing a** **general inquiry form** **on our website. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**This is solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes will not receive a response.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: Sales Director, Benelux and Nordics
description:
Cribl does differently.



What does that mean? It means we are a serious company that doesn't take itself too seriously; and we're looking for people who love to get stuff done, and laugh a bit along the way. We're growing rapidly - looking for collaborative, curious, and motivated team members who are passionate about putting customers first. As a remote-first company we believe in empowering our employees to do their best work, wherever they are.



As the data engine for IT and Security many of the biggest names in the most demanding industries trust Cribl to solve their most pressing data needs. Ready to do the best work of your career? Join the herd and unlock your opportunity.



**Sales Director -** **Cribl.io**  

**Location:** Benelux  

**Reports to:** VP of Sales  

**Department:** Sales  



About Company:



Cribl does differently.


What does that mean? It means we are a serious company that doesn't take itself too seriously; and we're looking for people who love to get stuff done, and laugh a bit along the way. We're growing rapidly - looking for collaborative, curious, and motivated team members who are passionate about putting customers first. As a remote-first company we believe in empowering our employees to do their best work, wherever they are.  


As the data engine for IT and Security many of the biggest names in the most demanding industries trust Cribl to solve their most pressing data needs. Ready to do the best work of your career? Join the herd and unlock your opportunit



**Role Overview:**
  

As the Sales Director, you will play a critical role in shaping and executing our go-to-market strategy (GTM) for our observability solutions. You'll recruit, develop, and lead a high-performing team of 5-7 Strategic Sales Representatives focused on selling Cribl's suite of products across a specific geographic region. You'll oversee the entire sales ecosystem, from lead generation through to closing, while continuously striving to exceed sales goals and drive revenue growth.  

You will be an integral member of Cribl's leadership team, reporting directly to the VP of Sales, and will be a key contributor to the ongoing development and execution of our GTM strategy.
  

**Why You'll Love This Role:**
* **Team Leadership & Development:**
	+ Recruit, coach, and develop a team of 5-7 Strategic Sales Representatives.
	+ Build a pipeline of future sales leaders within the organization.
	+ Set clear performance goals and KPIs, and consistently monitor and manage team performance.
	+ Drive a culture of collaboration, accountability, and continuous improvement.
* **Sales Strategy & Execution:**
	+ Create and implement a strategic business plan to achieve and exceed sales goals in your region.
	+ Own and manage the full sales lifecycle: from generating leads, nurturing relationships, and qualifying opportunities, through to closing deals.
	+ Build, develop, and maintain strong relationships with both prospects and channel partners.
	+ Navigate complex sales cycles and drive large enterprise deals (Fortune 1000).
* **Sales Ecosystem Management:**
	+ Oversee the sales pipeline, ensuring that strategic accounts and key opportunities are identified and nurtured.
	+ Collaborate with internal teams (marketing, customer success, product, etc.) to ensure alignment across all areas of the business.
	+ Leverage and improve existing tools and processes for prospecting, pipeline management, and closing deals.
* **Leadership & Collaboration:**
	+ Actively contribute to the development and refinement of Cribl's GTM strategy and sales playbook.
	+ Partner with other leaders across sales, product, and marketing to drive the success of the business.
	+ Regularly report on team performance, pipeline status, and sales metrics to the VP of Sales and executive leadership.

We are a remote-first company and work happens across many time-zones – you may be required to occasionally perform duties outside your standard working hours.


**As An Active Member Of Our Team, You Will…**
* **Required:**
	+ Minimum of 5 years of experience leading and developing strategic sales teams.
	+ Proven track record of overachievement in annual sales targets, with an ability to deliver consistent results.
	+ Significant experience leading teams selling through security channel partners.
	+ In-depth experience navigating complex sales cycles and closing large, enterprise-level deals.
	+ Strong background in SaaS sales, specifically within cloud, logs, metrics, IT operations, and security.
	+ Proficient in MEDDIC methodology to manage sales opportunities and close high-value deals.
	+ Experience in pipeline development, strategic account management, and new business acquisition.
* **Bonus Points:**
	+ Background in Cloud, Security, or Machine Learning industries is a plus.
	+ Familiarity with observability or related IT operational tools and platforms is a bonus.

**Why You'll Love This Role:**
* **Innovation:** At Cribl.io, we're at the forefront of observability, solving critical problems for enterprises globally.
* **Culture:** We prioritize teamwork, integrity, and development—both for our product and for our people.
* **Growth:** Cribl.io is scaling rapidly, and you'll be part of a high-growth company that fosters career advancement opportunities.
* **Scale:** We are a Pre IPO company with a valuation of $3.5 billion

If you're a proven sales leader with a passion for building high-performing teams and driving revenue growth, we want to hear from you! Join us in redefining how enterprises approach observability and security.**Interested? Apply Now!**  


**Bring Your Whole Self**  

Diversity drives innovation, enables better decisions to support our customers, and inspires change for the better. We're building a culture where differences are valued and welcomed, and we work together to bring out the best in each other. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or any other applicable legally protected characteristics in the location in which the candidate is applying.



Interested in joining the Cribl herd? Learn more about the smartest, funniest, most passionate goats you'll ever meet at cribl.io/about-us.

title: Specialistsäljare till Atea Software, Cloud & Services
description:
Vill du arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där du får möjlighet att utveckla försäljningsstrategier för framtidens moln- och tjänstelösningar? Hos Atea Software, Cloud & Services söker vi nu en Specialistsäljare som vill vara en del av ett engagerat team och bidra till våra kunders framgångar.



Du kommer att utgå från någon av dessa kontor i norr:


* Dalarna
* Gävle
* Norrbotten
* Skellefteå
* Sundsvall
* Umeå
* Örnsköldsvik
* Östersund

  




**Din roll**
------------



I rollen som Specialistsäljare kommer du att spela en central roll i att utveckla och genomföra försäljningsstrategier för våra moln- och tjänstelösningar. Du arbetar nära kunderna för att identifiera deras behov och erbjuda skräddarsydda lösningar som hjälper dem att nå sina affärsmål.



Exempel på dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:


* Utveckla och genomföra försäljningsstrategier för moln- och tjänstelösningar.
* Bygga och underhålla starka kundrelationer.
* Identifiera och följa upp nya affärsmöjligheter.
* Samarbeta med interna team för att säkerställa kundnöjdhet.
* Delta i marknadsförings- och försäljningsevent.

**Ditt Team**
-------------



Du blir en del av ett team med 10 engagerade kollegor med placering från Borlänge till Luleå. Vi värdesätter ett öppet klimat och arbetar tätt tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål. Våra kollegor har varierande erfarenhet och kompetenser, men vi delar alla en passion för vårt arbete och ett driv att utvecklas tillsammans.


**Vem är du?**
--------------



Vi tror på dig och dina personliga kompetenser som är avgörande för att lyckas i rollen och trivas hos oss. Du är kommunikativ, relationsskapande och har ett affärstänk som hjälper dig att identifiera kundbehov och skapa värde.



För att lyckas i tjänsten som Specialistsäljare ser vi att du har:


* Erfarenhet av försäljning inom IT-branschen, gärna med fokus på mjukvara, moln- och tjänstelösningar.
* Stark kommunikations- och förhandlingsförmåga.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i team.
* Resultatorienterad med en stark drivkraft att nå och överträffa mål.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.

**Om Atea**
-----------



Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av IT-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med IT och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara IT-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar IT-värld.



På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.


**Kontakt & mer information**
-----------------------------



Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Niclas Larsson, Försäljningschef Software i Region Norr via niclas.b.larsson@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Ansök redan idag!


**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan till oss!**

  


**Följ oss i sociala medier**

  

#LI-REMOTE

title: Enterprise Account Executive - Dream Team
description:
In the cloud, every second counts. On the leading edge of security, Sysdig stops attacks in real-time by instantly detecting changes in cloud security risk with runtime insights and open source Falco. Trusted by a large enterprise customer base, we are a well-funded startup, passionate open source enthusiasts at heart, and problem-solvers who are building and delivering powerful solutions to secure cloud-native applications.  

We have an organizational focus on delivering value to customers. We appreciate diverse opinions and open dialogue to spur ideas. We believe in working together to achieve our goals, and we pride ourselves on a flexible work culture. We're an international company that understands how to cultivate an inclusive environment across remote teams.  

And we're a great place to work too - we've been named a "Best Places to Work" by Inc, the San Francisco Business Time, and Built In, with recognitions ranging from "Best Benefits" to a "Best Company for Happiness".  

We are looking for driven team members who want to join us on our mission to lead cloud security globally. Does this sound like the right place for you?
### **What you will do**

* Reporting to our Regional Sales Director you will implement sales plans for your assigned territory by forecasting and exceeding quota
* Through a combination of inbound and outbound leads, you will manage a high-velocity, SaaS funnel
* You will manage and track opportunities through CRM and other supporting tools
* You will collaborate on and improve the sales cycle, including product, support, and sales engineering
* You will work with and promote Partner ecosystem
* Convey Sysdig key value drivers and differentiators to prospects and customers
* Understand the competitive market, being familiar with competing companies and their offerings

### **What you will bring with you**

* 7+ years of IT Enterprise Sales experience, with a strong focus on security-related deals — including SaaS security, cloud security, Kubernetes/containers, open source, and APM
* Track record overachieving sales targets
* Ability to learn new products and processes quickly
* Experience with Salesforce and Clari Competitive/Driven Excellent communication skills verbal and written, team player
* Must be willing to travel to clients to support sales relationships (if required)
* Entrepreneurial – Willing to go the extra mile, strong work ethic, resourceful, "get it done" attitude
* Ability to work with multiple sources of pipelines, including LDR, SDR, ISR and Channels
* Ability to cross collaborate with Marketing, Customer Success and other business units as needed
* Ability to bring a C level network to the table and have C level conversations (CISO)

### **What we look for**

* SaaS sales experience
* Track records of hunting new business opportunities in greenfield territories
* MEDDPICC experience and Challenger sales experience

### **When you join Sysdig, you can expect:**

* Extra days off to prioritize your well-being
* Mental health support for you and your family through the Modern Health app
* Great compensation package


We would love for you to join us! Please reach out even if your experience doesn't perfectly match the job description. We can always explore other options after starting the conversation. Your background and passion will set you apart, especially if your career path is different.  

Some of our Hiring Managers are globally distributed, an English version of your CV will be appreciated. *Sysdig values a diverse workplace and encourages women, people of color, LGBTQIA+ individuals, people with disabilities, members of ethnic minorities, foreign-born residents, and veterans to apply. Sysdig is an equal-opportunity employer. Sysdig does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other legally protected status.* *#LI- MC**#LI-Hybrid*

title: Salesforceutvecklare inom Kundplattform & CRM
description:
* *Ansök senast: 11 juni 2025*
* *Stockholm*
* *Hybrid*
***Arbetsuppgifter***
---------------------

*Vill du vara med och utveckla* *vår CRM-plattform som stöttar medarbetare på bankens mötesplatser?* *Vi söker en erfaren Salesforce utvecklare som vill vara med på vår implementation av Salesforce.*

***Ditt team***  

*Du kommer bli en del av ett av Handelsbankens Salesforce team. Teamet består av Salesforce utvecklare, Business Analyst, Testare, Agil Product Owner och Team Coach. Tillsammans ansvarar teamet för att leverera funktionalitet som stödjer Handelsbankens kundplattform och CRM-lösning baserad på Salesforce. Vi arbetar i tvärfunktionella agila team och du kommer samarbeta nära utvecklare och arkitekter, inom och utanför vårt område. Vi har roligt på jobbet och vårt team präglas av hög kompetens och bred erfarenhet inom både teknik och affärsverksamhet.*

***Din roll***  

*Som Salesforce utvecklare kommer du att vara en del av ett högpresterande team där innovation och problemlösning står i fokus. Du kommer tillsammans med teamet ta fram och utveckla tekniska lösningar enligt Salesforce best practise. Vi arbetar med den senaste teknologi-stacken från Salesforce och vi drivs av att testa nya saker och se hur vi kan ta in dessa i våra leveranser. Teamet kommer översätta strategiska verksamhetsmål (Epics, Features) till IT-lösningar, säkerställa riskhantering och att lösningar uppfyller regelverks efterlevnad, samt säkerställa kvalitet och effektivitet på leveranser.*

***Vi har riktigt bra förmåner***
---------------------------------

* *Tjänstepension*
* *Vinstdelningssystem*
* *Gruppförsäkring*
* *Friskvårdsbidrag*
* *Bidrag vid föräldraledighet*
* *Banktjänster*
* *Banking services*
* *Benefit in connection with parental leave*
* *Health promotion subsidy*
* *Group insurance*
* *Occupational pension*
* *Profit-sharing scheme*
***Kvalifikationer***
---------------------

***Din profil***  

*Vi söker dig som är utvecklare och har gedigen erfarenhet av utveckling och implementation av Salesforce. Du kan arbeta självständigt och har djup förståelse och erfarenhet av olika Salesforce produkter. Vidare har du erfarenhet av att designa och utveckla användarorienterade, effektiva, och skalbara Salesforce applikationer enligt bästa praxis i den senaste tekniken. Då vi samarbetar med hela koncernen behöver du behärska god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.*

*Vi söker även dig som har:*

* *erfarenhet av att implementera Lightning Components, Flows, Apex Controllers, Batch Apex, Schedulers och Apex Triggers*
* *kunskap om att integrera Salesforce med externa applikationer med hjälp av tredjepartsverktyg via SOAP och REST API-integration*
* *certifieringar inom Salesforce tex Salesforce Administrator, Plattform Developer 1, Sales cloud och Service cloud*
* *varit involverad i större implementeringar av Salesforce i en stor organisation*

*Som person strävar du efter att arbeta tillsammans med ditt team och ta tillvara på kollegors olika perspektiv för att nå uppsatta mål. Du anpassar din kommunikation till målgruppen och har ett pedagogiskt förhållningssätt i att vägleda och motivera andra. Det kommer naturligt att tänka i nya banor för att komma till skalbara lösningar. Du håller dig uppdaterad kring det senaste inom ditt område och omvärldsbevakar för att söka efter bästa möjliga lösningar.*

***Välkommen med din ansökan!***

***Vi erbjuder***

* *en trygg och stabil arbetsgivare*
* *dynamiskt och stimulerande arbete*
* *work-life balance*
* *kompetens- och karriärutveckling*
* *inkluderande- och jämställd arbetsmiljö*
* *konkurrenskraftigt förmånspaket*

***Kontaktuppgifter***

***Rekryterande chef:*** *Fredrik Rutberg, fredrik.rutberg@handelsbanken.se & Ann-Chistine Stålfors, ann-christine.stalfors@handelsbanken.se*  

***TA Partner:*** *Alva Jonerot, alva.jonerot@handelsbanken.se*  

***Facklig representant Finansförbundet:*** *Per Almshult, per.almshult@handelsbanken.se*  

***Facklig representant Akademikerföreningen:*** *Paul Gutesten, paul.gutesten@handelsbanken.se*


  
**Om företaget**
----------------

Hos oss får du ett stort eget ansvar och möjlighet att påverka din egen och bankens framtida utveckling. Våra olika perspektiv, insikter och innovativa idéer utgör en grund för hur vi tillsammans bygger vidare banken för framtiden. För oss är utveckling allt och när du utvecklas, utvecklas banken.


Vi har ett unikt sätt att bedriva bank som bygger på en stark tilltro och respekt för den enskilda människan. Våra värderingar och starka företagskultur har en avgörande betydelse för vår framgång och guidar oss om hur vi uppnår våra mål, samarbetar och stöttar varandra. Genom stark lokal förankring, ett decentraliserat arbetssätt och ett långsiktigt perspektiv skapar vi hållbara relationer genom livets olika skeenden. Hos oss på Handelsbanken är alla viktiga. Vi kommer från olika platser med olika bakgrund, erfarenhet och utbildning. Tillsammans är vi Handelsbanken.  



  

Mer om Handelsbanken *Mer om Handelsbanken*

*TOM* *Bildades 1871*

*TOM* *En av världens starkaste banker*

*TOM* *All verksamhet utgår från kunden*

*TOM* *Decentraliserat arbetssätt med tilltro och respekt för individen*

*TOM* *Rikstäckande kontorsnät på våra hemmamarknader*
